comments:
Build ID: M20060921-0945

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Run Some Java Program to print some output to "Console" View.
2.Use "Space" And "Back Space" keys even if the program not taking the input. 
3.Try selecting the part of lines which are moved due to the above keys.
4. Keep selecting the text in different positions until you get the exception.


More information:
NOTE: This error came even if the program running is not at all using System.in
